translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mental faculty is not apprehended in the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact at the mental faculty.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the earth element is not apprehended in the earth element.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the earth element is not apprehended in the earth element.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the water element is not apprehended in the water element.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the water element is not apprehended in the water element.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the fire element is not apprehended in the fire element.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the fire element is not apprehended in the fire element.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the wind element is not apprehended in the wind element.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the wind element is not apprehended in the wind element.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the space element is not apprehended in the space element.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the space element is not apprehended in the space element.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the consciousness element is not apprehended in the consciousness element.

translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the consciousness element is not apprehended in the consciousness element.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the eye constituent is not apprehended in the eye constituent.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the eye constituent is not apprehended in the eye constituent.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the form constituent is not apprehended in the form constituent.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the form constituent is not apprehended in the form constituent.🔽“To illustrate further, Subhūti, the eye consciousness constituent is not apprehended in the eye consciousness constituent.

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp name and form in name and form;

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched drug la skye mched drug yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched drug la skye mched drug yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the six sense fields in the six sense fields;🔽because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp contact in contact;🔽because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp sensation in sensation;🔽because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp craving in craving;

original: reg pa la reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: reg pa la reg pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp appropriation in appropriation;🔽because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp becoming in becoming;🔽because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp birth in birth;🔽because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp aging and death in aging and death.

original: de ni / 'di ltar tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because feeling is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba la tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba la tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, feeling does not appropriate feeling.

original: de ni / 'di ltar sred pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sred pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because craving is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sred pa la sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sred pa la sred pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, craving does not appropriate craving.

original: de ni / 'di ltar len pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar len pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because appropriation is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir len pa la len pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir len pa la len pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, appropriation does not appropriate appropriation.

original: de ni / 'di ltar srid pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar srid pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because existence is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir srid pa la srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir srid pa la srid pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, existence does not appropriate existence.

original: de ni / 'di ltar skye ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar skye ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because birth is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba la skye ba @128b yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba la skye ba @128b yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, birth does not appropriate birth.

original: de ni / 'di ltar rga shi la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rga shi la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because old age and death are not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rga shi la rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rga shi la rga shi yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Old age and death do not grasp at old age and death because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because the perfection of giving is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: The perfection of giving does not grasp at the perfection of giving because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because the perfection of morality is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: The perfection of morality does not grasp at the perfection of morality because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because the perfection of patience is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: For the perfection of patience is not apprehended in the perfection of patience, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: For the perfection of perseverance is not apprehended in the perfection of perseverance, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.🔽For the perfection of concentration is not apprehended in the perfection of concentration, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: For the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the external, the perfection of wisdom does not apprehend the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni / 'di ltar @129a *//
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar @129a *//
translated: For,

original: nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: the emptiness of the internal is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the external and the internal, the emptiness of the internal is not apprehended in the emptiness of the internal.🔽For,

original: de ni / 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: the emptiness of the external is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the external and the internal, the emptiness of the external is not apprehended in the emptiness of the external.🔽For,

original: de ni / 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: the emptiness of the external and the internal is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the external and the internal, the emptiness of the external and the internal is not apprehended in the emptiness of the external and the internal.

original: de ni / 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness of emptiness is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal, emptiness of emptiness is not apprehended in emptiness of emptiness.

original: de ni / 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness of the great is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal, emptiness of the great is not apprehended in emptiness of the great.

original: de ni / 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness of the ultimate is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal, emptiness of the ultimate is not apprehended in emptiness of the ultimate.

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Thus, emptiness of the conditioned is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the emptiness of internal phenomena is empty of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena is empty of the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is empty of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.🔽Because the emptiness of emptiness is empty of the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of the great is empty of the emptiness of the great, and the emptiness of the ultimate is empty of the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs @129b su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs @129b su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, and the emptiness of the unlimited is empty of the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽Because the emptiness of the inherent existence of phenomena is empty of the emptiness of the inherent existence of phenomena, the emptiness of all things is empty of the emptiness of all things, and the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is empty of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.🔽Because the emptiness of the non-apprehension of things is empty of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of things, the emptiness of essential nature is empty of the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the non-apprehension of non-things is empty of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of non-things.🔽Because the emptiness of the conditioned is empty of the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned is empty of the emptiness of the unconditioned, and the emptiness of the unlimited is empty of the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the emptiness of the extremes is empty of the emptiness of the extremes, the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is empty of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, and the emptiness of non-rejection is empty of the emptiness of non-rejection.🔽Because the emptiness of nature is empty of the emptiness of nature, the emptiness of all phenomena is empty of the emptiness of all phenomena, and the emptiness of specific characteristics is empty of the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of non-rejection is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of non-rejection is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of nature, the emptiness of nature is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of nature is not apprehended.

original: de ni / 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of all phenomena is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, all phenomena do not fully apprehend the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of its own mark, it does not fully apprehend the emptiness of its own mark.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of its own mark does not fully apprehend the emptiness of its own mark.

original: de ni / 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, it does not fully apprehend the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa @130a *//
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa @130a *//
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of non-apprehension does not fully apprehend the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of non-existence, it does not fully apprehend the emptiness of non-existence.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of non-existence does not fully apprehend the emptiness of non-existence.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of non-apprehension does not apprehend the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽Because of the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of essential nature does not apprehend the emptiness of essential nature.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of essential nature does not apprehend the emptiness of essential nature.🔽Because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence does not apprehend the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence does not apprehend the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness, the applications of mindfulness do not apprehend the applications of mindfulness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the applications of mindfulness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the right efforts.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the legs of miraculous power.

original: de ni / 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de; phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de; phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the faculties.

original: @130b phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dbang po rnams la dbang po rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: @130b phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dbang po rnams la dbang po rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the powers.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the limbs of awakening.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the path.

original: de ni / 'di ltar stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the powers do not exist and are not found.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir stobs rnams la stobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir stobs rnams la stobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: The powers do not fully apprehend the powers, because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the limbs of awakening do not exist and are not found.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: The limbs of awakening do not fully apprehend the limbs of awakening, because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the noble eightfold path does not exist and is not found.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: The noble eightfold path does not fully apprehend the noble eightfold path, because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because the noble truths do not exist and are not found.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the immeasurables.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the formless absorptions.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of emptiness.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the great emptiness.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the ultimate emptiness.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of non-dispersal.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of non-observation.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of the non-existent.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of own-nature.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of other-nature.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of the nature of non-existence.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of the nature of existence.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir @131a *//🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because the emancipations are ungraspable.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena,

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: the emancipations do not grasp at the emancipations.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena,

original: de ni / 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: the stages of higher and higher and more subtle and formless meditative absorption do not grasp at the stages of higher and higher and more subtle and formless meditative absorption.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena,

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation do not grasp at the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation as the gateways to liberation.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the superknowledges as the superknowledges.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽@131b de ni; 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽@131b de ni; 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the meditative stabilizations as the meditative stabilizations.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, they do not grasp the dhāraṇī gateways as the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /

translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the dhāraṇī gateways do not grasp at the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the powers of the tathāgatas do not grasp at the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the fearlessnesses do not grasp at the fearlessnesses.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the detailed and thorough knowledges do not grasp at the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not grasp at the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of all aspects does not grasp at the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni / 'di ltar byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because great love is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Great love does not appropriate great love, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena and the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: de ni; 'di ltar snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni; 'di ltar snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because great compassion is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Great compassion does not appropriate great compassion, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena and the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / @132a *//
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / @132a *//
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas do not appropriate the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena and the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: It is because the knowledge of all aspects is not something that can be appropriated.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad shes pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to; ;de ni /🔽'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad shes pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to; ;de ni / 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of all phenomena does not grasp at the knowledge of all phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //🔽de ni / 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to // de ni / 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa med de /
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of the aspects of the path does not grasp at the knowledge of the aspects of the path.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of all aspects does not grasp at the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of all phenomena does not grasp at the knowledge of all phenomena.🔽Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of the aspects of the path does not grasp at the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to //
translated: Because of the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the knowledge of all aspects does not grasp at the knowledge of all aspects.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: in that way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattvas, through the method of not grasping at any phenomena, arise in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba yin nam /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba yin nam /
translated: do bodhisattva great beings who train like that train in the perfection of wisdom and emerge in the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
translated: bodhisattva great beings who train like that train in the perfection of wisdom and emerge in the knowledge of all aspects with respect to all dharmas by way of not apprehending anything.”🔽Śāriputra asked,

original: smras pa / tshe @132b dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe @132b dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: “How can bodhisattva great beings training like that train in order to appropriate and abandon all dharmas and how can they come forth to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see the production of form,

original: 'gag pa mi mthong /🔽blang ba mi mthong /
analyzed: 'gag pa mi mthong / blang ba mi mthong /
translated: do not see the stopping of form,🔽do not see the taking up of form,

original: dor ba mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba mi mthong /

original: gsog pa mi mthong /🔽'bri ba mi mthong /🔽'grib pa mi mthong /
analyzed: gsog pa mi mthong / 'bri ba mi mthong / 'grib pa mi mthong /
translated: do not see the accumulation of form,🔽do not see the diminution of form,🔽do not see the decrease of form,

original: 'phel ba mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'phel ba mi mthong ste /
translated: and do not see the increase of form.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: 'gag pa mi mthong /🔽blang ba mi mthong /
analyzed: 'gag pa mi mthong / blang ba mi mthong /
translated: They do not see cessation.🔽They do not see taking up.

original: dor ba mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba mi mthong /

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa mi mthong /🔽rnam par byang ba mi mthong /🔽sogs pa mi mthong /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa mi mthong / rnam par byang ba mi mthong / sogs pa mi mthong /

original: 'bri ba mi mthong /🔽'grib pa mi mthong /
analyzed: 'bri ba mi mthong / 'grib pa mi mthong /
translated: They do not see diminution.🔽They do not see decrease.

original: 'phel ba mi mthong ste /
analyzed: 'phel ba mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see increase.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de ni / 'di ltar tshor ba tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs so //

original: 'du shes kyi skye ba mi mthong /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi skye ba mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the arising of perception.

original: 'gag pa mi mthong /🔽blang ba mi mthong /
analyzed: 'gag pa mi mthong / blang ba mi mthong /
translated: They do not see cessation.🔽They do not see taking up.

original: dor ba mi mthong /

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa mi mthong /🔽rnam par byang ba mi mthong /🔽gsog pa mi mthong /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa mi mthong / rnam par byang ba mi mthong / gsog pa mi mthong /

original: 'bri ba mi mthong /🔽'grib pa mi mthong /
analyzed: 'bri ba mi mthong / 'grib pa mi mthong /
translated: They do not see diminution.🔽They do not see decrease.

original: @133a *// 'phel ba mi mthong ste /
analyzed: @133a *// 'phel ba mi mthong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'du shes 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: 'du byed kyi skye ba mi mthong /

analyzed: 'gag pa mi mthong /

analyzed: blang ba mi mthong / dor ba mi mthong /

original: gsog pa med pa dang / 'bri ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa'i phyir mi slob mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //

translated: because there is no accumulation, no decrease, no diminution, and no increase, they train in the perfection of wisdom without training and without arising, and they arise to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //

translated: Nor can the suchness of ignorance be found in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be found in the real nature of ignorance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ma rig pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ma rig pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Nor can the real nature of ignorance be found in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be found in the suchness of volitional factors.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽'du byed kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // 'du byed kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Nor can the suchness of volitional factors be found in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be found in the real nature of volitional factors.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'du byed kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang 'du byed kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: Nor can the real nature of volitional factors be found in the Thus-Gone One.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of consciousness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //

translated: The suchness of consciousness is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the real nature of consciousness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of consciousness is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of name and form.

translated: The suchness of name and form is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the real nature of name and form.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so // skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of name and form is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.🔽The Tathāgata is not apprehended in the suchness of the six sense fields.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skye mched @155a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skye mched @155a *//
translated: The suchness of the six sense fields is not apprehended in the Tathāgata.

original: drug gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽skye mched drug gi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: drug gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // skye mched drug gi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One is not observed in the suchness of the six sense fields.🔽The suchness of the six sense fields is not observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not observed in the reality of the six sense fields.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skye mched drug gi chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skye mched drug gi chos nyid mi dmigs so // reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of the six sense fields is not observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not observed in the suchness of contact.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // reg pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of contact is not observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not observed in the reality of contact.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang reg pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of contact is not observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not observed in the suchness of sensation.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // tshor ba'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of sensation is not observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One is not observed in the reality of sensation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshor ba'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang tshor ba'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The reality of sensation is not observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of craving.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽sred pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // sred pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of craving cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of craving.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sred pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽len pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sred pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // len pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The real nature of craving cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of grasping.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang len pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //🔽len pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang len pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // len pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of grasping cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of grasping.

translated: The real nature of grasping cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.🔽The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the suchness of becoming.🔽The suchness of becoming cannot be observed in the Thus-Gone One.

original: srid pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: srid pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The Thus-Gone One cannot be observed in the real nature of becoming.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang srid pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //🔽skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang srid pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: the dharmatā of existence is not found in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of birth.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skye ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so // skye ba'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The suchness of birth is not found in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not found in the dharmatā of birth.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang skye ba'i chos nyid mi dmigs so // rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmatā of birth is not found in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not found in the suchness of old age and death.

translated: The suchness of old age and death is not found in the Tathāgata,🔽and the Tathāgata is not found in the dharmatā of old age and death.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rga shi'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rga shi'i chos nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: The dharmatā of old age and death is not found in the Tathāgata,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so //
